title: Proof Roundtable June 16, 2022: Down Market, Stable Bluechips
description:
Derek Edwards Schloss, gmoney, and Kevin Rose gather around the table to discuss gmoney's latest NFT project, the current state of the market and what it might mean for the future of NFTs, NFT wish lists, guessing what might be ahead for CryptoPunks, Goblintown, community building, and much more.
